justification: “Items on the self-report Barratt Impulsivity Scale (BIS) capture a tendency to act without thinking about the likely future consequences of the action.”
“Participants completed the following questionnaire: The State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) …”
“Participants completed the following questionnaire: … the Penn State Worry Questionnaire (PSWQ) …”
“Participants completed the following questionnaire: … the MASQ anhedonia scale.”
